Analyze Temporal Clustering Patterns

Source: R/data_quality.R
analyze_temporal_clustering.Rd

Detects patterns in contract timing such as seasonal employment, batch processing indicators, or systematic data collection periods.

Usage

analyze_temporal_clustering(dt, person_col = "cf", start_col = "inizio")

Arguments

dt

Data.table with employment records

person_col

Person identifier column name

start_col

Start date column name

Value

List with temporal clustering analysis
